beer.name: Dry Hopped Saint Rogue Red
beer.description: Reddish copper in color, a roasty malty flavor, with a hoppy-spruce finish.
beer.grains: Great Western Harrington, Klages, Munich & Hugh Baird Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Crystal 70-80.
Great Western Harrington, Klages, Munich & Hugh Baird Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Crystal 70-80.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
